entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of ice pellets. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of ice pellets near midnight. Risk of freezing rain and a thunderstorm late this evening and overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 10:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 10:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
